name: indentruby.vim
description:
This is the official ftplugin intended for installation in the *global* indent directory. 

It fixes a bug in the version included with Vim 6.1.  (Comment ending in [,.*(] screws
up the indenting for the next line(s).)
install_details: This is a global ftplugin.  Overwrite your $VIMRUNTIME/indent/ruby.vim with this one.
